titlePage: Don't worry, just reset your password
pPage: Only students and professors can register for the innovation hub. Log in using your institutional email.
warning: Fill in all the fields below!
Only UFGD institutional emails are valid.
It looks like this email is already in use. How about LOGGING IN?
pWarningPassword:
If there is a registered email, you will receive instructions on how to reset your password.

If you are unable to reset it, send an email to:

suporte.hubdeinovacoes@gmail.com
